title: Data Protection Policy
description: This Data Protection Policy outlines how we protect the personal information of users collected through our website and mobile application (collectively referred to as the "App").
description1: We may collect personal information from users, including but not limited to:
listItem21: Email verification token and its expiration date
listItem22: Phone verification token and its expiration date
listItem23: Password reset token and its expiration date
description3: We use the collected information for the following purposes:
infoListItem1: To provide and improve our services
infoListItem4: To respond to inquiries and provide support
description5: We implement appropriate security measures to protect personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. User passwords are encrypted to ensure security.
description6: Users have the right to access, update, or delete their personal information stored on the App. Upon request, we will delete user data, including personal information, posts, and other associated data.
description7: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer personal information to third parties without user consent, except as required by law or to facilitate the services provided by the App.
description8: We comply with applicable privacy laws and regulations, including the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA).
description9: If you have any questions or concerns about our Data Protection Policy or our data practices, please contact us through the information provided on our contacts page.
